Articles.Content:
Hey everyone I'm new to these forum so I just wanted to say hi

I have been on KSP since around the middle of October, a few weeks before the 0.22 update so I'm still quite new to the game xD None the less I have landed on the Mun and Duna manually and a hell load more planets with HyperEdit (I was messing around and wanted to try out some cinematics so i installed it and they just started playing around with it xD). I'm now trying to learn more things everyday I also have a channel where I play KSP On! Its not been up for very long but it has I think 6 videos on there! Feel free to check it out if you want https://www.youtube.com/user/GamingAndStuffWithAz

Here is my Duna base so far :3

Hope to be seeing you all round here if i need any questions answered

- Andrew

Welcome to the community Andrew

Congrats for reaching Duna, and that's a nice station, have fun on the forums and fly safe
From another KSP YouTuber: Welcome to the forums!
